# Insect/Fish Data Template

insect/fish name

sell price

Time/Day
- Northern Hemisphere
- Southern Hemisphere

location

image

---

EXAMPLE

Monarch Butterfly
Price: 140 Bells
Time & Location:
	* Northern Hemisphere: 4AM - 3PM, September - November
	* Southern Hemisphere: 4AM - 3PM, March - May
Location: Flying
Image: link to img file
